14#include <config.h>
15
16#include <isc/meminfo.h>
17#include <inttypes.h>
18#include <unistd.h>
19#ifdef HAVE_SYS_SYSCTL_H
20#include <sys/sysctl.h>
21#endif
22
23uint64_t
24isc_meminfo_totalphys(void) {
25#if defined(CTL_HW) && (defined(HW_PHYSMEM64) || defined(HW_MEMSIZE))
26 int mib[2];
27 mib[0] = CTL_HW;
28#if defined(HW_MEMSIZE)
29 mib[1] = HW_MEMSIZE;
30#elif defined(HW_PHYSMEM64)
31 mib[1] = HW_PHYSMEM64;
32#endif
33 uint64_t size = 0;
34 size_t len = sizeof(size);
35 if (sysctl(mib, 2, &size, &len, NULL, 0) == 0)
36 return (size);
37#endif
38#if defined(_SC_PHYS_PAGES) && defined(_SC_PAGESIZE)
39 return ((size_t) (sysconf(_SC_PHYS_PAGES) * sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE)));
40#endif
41 return (0);
42}
43
